lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova, the United States Open champion, will face Justine Henin-Hardenne, the French Open winner, in the semifinals of the WTA Championships in Madrid, and the No. 1 world ranking may be on the line.
snippet: Maria Sharapova, the United States Open champion, will face Justine Henin-Hardenne, the French Open winner, in the semifinals of the WTA Championships in Madrid, and the No. 1 world ranking may be on the line.
